'''''annon''''' is [[Sindarin]] for 'great door' or 'gate'.<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, ''annon''</ref>

==Etymology==
The word derives from the [[Sundocarme|root]] [[AD]].<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, '''AD'''</ref>
==Examples==
* ''[[Annon-in-Gelydh]]''
* ''[[Forannest]]'' - The northernmost gate of [[Rammas Echor]]
* ''[[Morannon]]'' - "Black Gate"
* ''[[Sirannon]]'' - "Gate-stream"

==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]] ''[[ando]]''
